column4: Judge trims 'Siri' patent cases against Google  Amazon and Microsoft
column5: A federal judge on Friday narrowed a batch of lawsuits filed by technology licensing company WiLAN Inc alleging Amazon.com Inc  Microsoft Corp  and Google LLC infringed its patents on voice assistant technology.

column4: Exclusive: Tesla holds battery supply talks with China's Lishen
column5: BEIJING U.S. electric vehicle (EV) maker Tesla Inc  has held talks with China's Tianjin Lishen to supply batteries for its new Shanghai factory  and two people with direct knowledge of the matter said the pair signed a preliminary agreement.

column4: EXCLUSIVE-Tesla holds battery supply talks with China's Lishen
column5: * Tesla's current exclusive supplier is Japan's Panasonic (Recasts on Tesla  Lishen talks)

column4: UPDATE 1-Toyota  Panasonic announce battery venture to expand EV push
column5: * Batteries made by JV to be sold to various automakers (Adds details of venture  background)

column4: China's Lishen says has not signed agreement with Tesla on supplying batteries
column5: BEIJING China's Tianjin Lishen said on Tuesday it has not signed any agreement with Tesla Inc  on supplying batteries to the U.S. electric vehicle maker's Shanghai factory.

column4: China's Lishen says has not signed agreement with Tesla on supplying batteries
column5: BEIJING  Jan 22 China's Tianjin Lishen said on Tuesday it has not signed any agreement with Tesla Inc on supplying batteries to the U.S. electric vehicle maker's Shanghai factory.

column4: EXCLUSIVE -Tesla says it received battery quotes from China's Lishen but no deal agreed
column5: * Tesla says it received quotes from Lishen  but nothing signed

column4: Tesla says it has no agreement with Chinese battery maker Lishen
column5: SHANGHAI Tesla Inc  denied on Tuesday that it had signed a preliminary agreement with Tianjin Lishen to supply batteries for its new Shanghai car factory  saying it had received quotes from the Chinese battery maker but did not proceed further.
